Question
========

Which of the following statements best represents what the researcher wants to achieve when using a t-test for mean difference to check whether the difference between conditions that he or she expects is is significant?

Answerlist
----------

* The researcher wants to support the null hypothesis through a p-value below .05.
* The researcher wants to reject the null hypothesis using a p-value below .05.
* The researcher wants to reject the null hypothesis using a p-value above .05.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The researcher wants to support the null hypothesis using a p-value below .05...: Incorrect
* The researcher wants to reject the null hypothesis using a p-value below .05: Correct
* The researcher wants to reject the null hypothesis using a p-value above .05: Incorrect
